The !OpenGroove Database is a database used by, and developed for, !OpenGroove.

==Operations==
Operations that a single change can represent:

*Insert.* This is an addition of a single object to the system. Included with this will be 

*Delete.* This is the removal of a single object from the system. If the object has any children, those children will be recursively removed as well.

*Update.* This is the update of a single property of a single object.
